item.title: Hugo安裝
item.description:
Step1. install hugo Mac only
install homebrew /usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)" then install hugo brew install hugo Step2. start a hugo project make your project folder hugo new site your_blog cd your_blog Step3. add theme you can find more themes here mkdir themes # use git clone git clone https://github.com/josephhutch/aether.git themes/aether # use git submodule(recommend) git submodule add https://github.com/josephhutch/aether themes/aether enable theme vim config.
